Data: Toss: Australia have won the toss and there are no surprises, they will be batting. Cameron White comes back for Nathan Hauritz, and Ben Hilfenhaus replaces Nathan Bracken. For South Africa, the injured Mark Boucher is replaced by
Steyn to Marsh, FOUR runs starts off on the pads and that's a freebie for Marsh, who only has to get a little bit of bat on ball and its down to fine leg for four
Steyn to Marsh, no run better ball, angling across Marsh off a full length and he leaves
Steyn to Marsh, no run good shot, pitches on the stumps and Marsh on-drives rather sweetly, but Albie falls across at mid-on and intercepts the shot, well stopped there
Steyn to Marsh, 1 wide 139ks, pitches and angles across and then bounces and deviates a lot and it takes a leaping effort from Boucher to stop it running away
Steyn to Marsh, 1 run a push into the covers and some good running gets him one
Steyn to Warner, no run good stuff, hitting a great length and seaming across to beat the bat
Steyn to Warner, 1 run pitches full and Warner drives to extra cover to get off the mark
Ntini to Warner, 1 wide pitches full to invite the drive, Warner chases and gets beat on the shot
Ntini to Warner, 1 wide another swing and miss, pitched up full and wide and Warner wafts
Ntini to Warner, no run better stuff, just back of a length outside off and Warner has to defend
Ntini to Warner, no run tucks him up with a short one, which Warner defends to midwicket
Ntini to Warner, no run pitches it up outside off and he drives and misses as it swings away
Ntini to Warner, no run again back of a length and Warner defends it to point

Ntini to Warner, OUT chipped straight to mid-on! Ntini continues to mix up his deliveries well, slipping one in full and straighter and swinging it back into Warner, who goes for a flick but finds Morne Morkel stationed insid
Ntini to Ponting, no run pitches full and wide and Ponting shoulders arms
Steyn to Marsh, FOUR runs full and straight and Marsh clips it off his pads square on the leg side
Steyn to Marsh, FOUR runs awesome! Steyn now gives Marsh width on the off side and he punches a sweet drive past extra cover, no one could move as the ball screeched away
Steyn to Marsh, no run back of a length and seaming across and he leaves it be
Steyn to Marsh, no run pitched up full, Marsh goes for an off-drive and inside-edges to leg

Steyn to Marsh, OUT good catch! Steyn angles it full and wide across Marsh, who flings the bat at the width but ends up slashing it off the toe end of the bat over backward point, Morne Morkel runs in from third man and dives
Steyn to Ponting, no run pitches full and wide and he shoulders arms again
Ntini to Hussey, 1 run pitches full and Hussey dabs into the covers to get of the mark
Ntini to Ponting, FOUR runs lovely shot from Ponting, just coming early onto the front foot and taking it on the half-volley, driving elegantly through the covers, he plays that shot really well
Ntini to Ponting, FOUR runs rubbish ball, short and swinging way down the pads and Ponting clips it away past a tumbling de Villiers, who had no chance of getting to it
Ntini to Ponting, no run beats him this time, holding back the length and Ponting has a waft outside off stump, feet not to the pitch, and the ball jags back
Ntini to Ponting, no run better area to pitch it in, and the late movement back in moves the ball very close to the top of off stump as Ponting shoulders arms to it
Ntini to Ponting, 2 runs drifts down and he clips it down to fine leg to end the over
Steyn to Hussey, no run 138ks, pitches and seams away and Hussey leaves it be
Steyn to Hussey, no run 143.8ks, held back and angles across and he leaves again
Steyn to Hussey, no run back of a length on middle and off and he defends to cover
Steyn to Hussey, no run pitches full and goes across outside off and he leaves it be
Steyn to Hussey, no run pitched up wide again and Hussey watches it go by to de Villiers
Steyn to Hussey, FOUR runs dragged in a bit short and he pulls it through square on the leg side
Ntini to Ponting, no run 141ks, pitched up outside off and he shoulders arms
Ntini to Ponting, 1 wide again he gets too much swing and the ball drifts down the pads
Ntini to Ponting, no run pitches on the stumps, pushed into the covers, where Gibbs dives
Ntini to Ponting, no run goes for a big shot outside off but mistimes it, chopping to point
Ntini to Ponting, no run change of pace, full on off stump, Ponting pushes hard at it off the front foot and gets an inside edge back past leg stump, he was trying to go for it on the rise
Ntini to Ponting, no run good bowling again, hitting a length on off to get him defending
Ntini to Ponting, 1 run straighter one and he clips it just wide of midwicket
Steyn to Ponting, 2 runs again too straight and Ponting flicks it out to Morne in the deep

Steyn to Ponting, no run big shout for leg before, pitches fullish and seams back in to beat Ponting's bat as he pushes down the line, he didn't get a big stride forward and is hit just outside the off stump, and when I say j
Steyn to Ponting, no run pitches on middle and off and he plays it to midwicket loosely
Steyn to Ponting, no run invites the drive and Ponting comes forward and cannot beat cover
Steyn to Ponting, no run tidy stuff again, pitching and straightening and he defends
Steyn to Ponting, 1 run slower ball, full and swinging, and he clips it to midwicket
Ntini to Ponting, 2 runs good shot, comes onto the front foot and pushes on the rise through square, Duminy gives chase downhill and retrieves the ball
Ntini to Ponting, no run pitches on a length and he defends firmly to the off side
Ntini to Ponting, no run keeps him quiet again, not offering room and Ponting defends
Ntini to Ponting, FOUR runs pitches wider and Ponting commits himself onto the front foot, reaching out and square-driving it uppishly between cover and point and gets another boundary
Ntini to Ponting, FOUR runs shorter and he gets back and carves it backward of point, well played
Ntini to Ponting, FOUR runs bang, that's four! Dropped in short and in a flash he pulls it over midwicket
Steyn to Hussey, no run pitches outside off and he leaves it be
Steyn to Hussey, 2 runs lands outside off again and he runs it down to third man
Steyn to Hussey, no run hits a length and deviates it and he shoulders arms
Steyn to Hussey, no run back of a length on off stump, defended off the back foot back to the bowler
Steyn to Hussey, no run similar length, on off stump, Hussey jabs it towards cover
Steyn to Hussey, no run some more width provided this time, Hussey drives, but doesn't best the man at cover
Morkel to Ponting, FOUR runs and he is welcomed in with a spanking pull shot from Ponting, swiveling and hitting the short ball superbly past midwicket
Morkel to Ponting, no run pitches full, expectedly, to get him pushing off the front foot to cover
Morkel to Ponting, no run much better length, on the seam, getting Ponting defending
Morkel to Ponting, FOUR runs lovely shot, just pushing the ball straight down the ground
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run another pleasing drive off the front foot to cover, where Duminy misfields and allows Ponting a single, and my is he looking dangerous today is Ponting
Morkel to Hussey, 4 runs full on middle and off and flicked past midwicket, where Morne runs after it and dives to flick it back in, but they manage to run four in the process
Morkel to Ponting, no run hits a length and beats him first ball, Ponting pushing and missing
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run another good shot, Ponting easing forward and square-driving for one
Morkel to Hussey, no run low full toss and Hussey pats it back to Morne, who fields easily
Morkel to Hussey, (no ball) oversteps, its a good ball that deviates off the upright seam to get Hussey shouldering arms outside off stump, but its also a free hit
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run of all things he bowls a full toss, Hussey swings it out to the deep, not getting hold of it, the ball drops safely and Duminy leaps up to collect it on the rebound
Morkel to Ponting, no run pitched up and Ponting pushes it off the front foot to cover
Morkel to Ponting, no run on the pads, asking for trouble, but he clips it straight to Amla
Morkel to Hussey, no run lovely drive there off the front foot, but well stopped at cover too
Morkel to Hussey, 1 leg bye hits a middle-and-leg length to cramp Hussey, who deflects it to gully

Morkel to Ponting, no run what are they doing out there? Albie serves it up full and gets some swing, Ponting drives away from the body off the front foot and gets an outside edge to de Villiers, but there is no confident ap
Morkel to Ponting, no run on the stumps and played to Amla at midwicket
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run a loose drive away from the body, in the air between cover and point
Morkel to Hussey, no run hits a good length and he pushes it to extra cover
Morkel to Ponting, no run pitches on the stumps and he clips the ball to mid-on
Morkel to Ponting, no run pitches on a length and he drives the ball to the off side
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run pitches and swings away, Ponting goes to hit it down the ground but gets a leading edge over the off side, basically spooning it in the air
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run hits a length and he turns it away for one
Morkel to Ponting, FOUR runs pitched up and he hammers it powerfully down past mid-off, bang
Morkel to Ponting, no run hits a length and nips back and he defends awkwardly
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run pitches fullish outside off stump and he drives into the covers
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run hits a length and he defends it to the off side
Morkel to Hussey, no run hits a length and he pushes it to cover
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run a tip-and-run towards backward point, Hussey sets off, Ponting sells him down the river, he turns and head back, Gibbs swoops across and misses the stumps
Morkel to Ponting, no run pitches on a length and he pushes the ball toward cover
Morkel to Ponting, FOUR runs now he goes downtown, just hitting through the line over mid-on, hit high in the air, one bounce and four and he moves to 49
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run sliding on to the pads, Hussey works it away towards square leg for a single
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run overpitched outside off, Ponting reaches out and drives towards deep cover to reach his fifty
Morkel to Hussey, no run slightly short of a length, thuds into Michael Hussey's thigh pad
Morkel to Hussey, no run almost a replay of the previous ball, Hussey was looking to turn it away to square leg, hits his pads
Morkel to Hussey, no run incoming delivery, defended off the back foot to silly mid-on
Morkel to Hussey, (no ball) Spoils what had been a fine over so far with a no-ball, again targetting Hussey's leg stump, the batsman can't get bat on it
Morkel to Hussey, SIX runs Whack! Hussey loves that midwicket boundary, Morkel drops it short, and Hussey clobbers it into the crowd
Botha to Ponting, no run starts off with a flighted ball, pitching just outside off, Ponting defends it to the leg side
Botha to Ponting, 2 runs drops it short this time, pitching on middle and the turn takes it past leg, Ponting helps it towards fine leg for a couple
Botha to Ponting, no run short again, a touch outside off, Ponting pulls it towards square leg
Botha to Ponting, no run played towards short midwicket
Botha to Ponting, 1 run on the pads, Ponting helps himself to an easy single after punching it down to long-on
Botha to Hussey, no run nice length, a bit of width outside off, Hussey defends towards mid-off
Morkel to Ponting, 2 runs room on offer and he laces that backward of point, out to where Albie dives superbly and cuts off the boundary
Morkel to Ponting, no run 143.4ks, pitched up outside off and he leaves it alone
Morkel to Ponting, no run pitches on off stump and swings, pushed to the cover fielder
Morkel to Ponting, no run driven straight down the track, sweetly, but Morne sticks a hand out
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run short and wide and cut out to the deep cover boundary patroller
Morkel to Hussey, no run pitches on the stumps and swings in, pushed to midwicket
Botha to Ponting, no run tossed up, turns in, glided to backward point, where Amla fields
Botha to Ponting, 1 run tossed up and he gets well forward and pushes to the off side
Botha to Hussey, 1 run flat on middle and leg and knocked to the on side for one more
Botha to Ponting, 1 run spins back in from wide of off stump, Ponting waits for turn and then dabs it wide of backward point, calling immediately for the single
Botha to Hussey, 1 run pitches a tad straighter and Hussey gets back to turn it for one
Botha to Ponting, no run pitches on middle and leg and straightens, Ponting shuffles across and ends up playing the ball down to mid-on, who slides and fields to cut off the single
Morkel to Hussey, 3 runs well played by Hussey, collecting on the rise and piercing the covers
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run pitches wide to bring Ponting onto the front foot, he eases a push through the gap between cover and point and continues to prosper
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run too straight and he clips a single off the pads, as easy as they come
Morkel to Ponting, no run pitches a foot outside off stump and gets some good carry to de Villiers, Ponting comes onto the front foot and shoulders arms
Morkel to Ponting, no run this one is on the stumps and Ponting pats it back to Morne
Morkel to Ponting, 1 run goes a bit straighter and that one is turned in the air past midwicket
Botha to Ponting, 1 run tossed up to get him well forward, steering the ball wide of point

Botha to Hussey, OUT lbw! Botha tosses it up on the stumps, purchases some drift, Hussey gets across to paddle it around the corner, but there's no bat on that and after an imploring appeal the umpire raises the finger of fa
Botha to Hussey, 1 run tossed up on off stump, he shuffles and turns it to square leg
Botha to Ponting, no run a tad short and he swivels it to a tumbling square leg
Botha to Ponting, 1 run tossed up, he uses his feet and drives to mid-on for one
Botha to Hussey, no run pitches on the stumps and he wrists it toward square leg
Ntini to Ponting, no run full and a bit wide, he reaches out and mistimes the shot to point
Ntini to Ponting, 1 run now he makes better contact and dabs the ball into the off side
Ntini to Hussey, no run pushed off the front foot to cover, where Duminy dives and saves runs
Ntini to Hussey, 1 run hits this one into the gap between cover and point and sets off
Ntini to Ponting, OUT Ntini strikes, pitching the slower offcutter on a length and Ponting chases it on the rise, hitting it straight to McKenzie stationed at short catching cover
Ntini to Haddin, 1 run full and swinging in and he drives with an inside edge to midwicket
Botha to Haddin, no run tossed up on the stumps and he pats it back softly
Botha to Haddin, no run flatter just outside off stump and driven to the off side
Botha to Haddin, no run shorter ball forces him onto the back foot and he defends
Botha to Haddin, 1 run flighted up on the stumps and Haddin punches it down the ground
Botha to Hussey, 1 run uses his feet and wrists to clip that down toward mid-on
Botha to Haddin, no run tossed up and played back to Botha
Ntini to Hussey, FOUR runs pitches it up wide to invite the airy shot and and Hussey flashes a drive off the front foot, in the air wide of cover, and no stopping that
Ntini to Hussey, FOUR runs lovely little punch off the front foot, not a half-volley but Hussey goes after the wide one and bisects two fielders to get another pleasing boundary
Ntini to Hussey, no run just back of a length and he defends solidly toward point
Ntini to Hussey, no run 126.6ks, short of a length outside off and no shot offered
Ntini to Hussey, 1 wide slides down the pads and de Villiers does the collecting
Ntini to Hussey, no run gets to the pitch and drives to cover, where the fielder dives and saves
Ntini to Hussey, no run back of a length outside off and he shoulders arms in peace
Botha to Haddin, no run goes back and across and plays the ball in front of square leg
Botha to Haddin, no run flatter one and Haddin gets onto the back foot to play it back
Botha to Haddin, 1 run on the stumps and now Haddin punches it on the rise to mid-on
Botha to Hussey, 1 run tossed up slower, starts to dip and Hussey clips it past midwicket

Botha to Haddin, OUT and he throws it away with a stupid shot! Botha gets a second, lobbing it up to tempt the big shot, Haddin cannot resist and miscues the slog out to Kallis who settles under it at deep midwicket just in
Botha to Hussey, no run ah well bowled! Botha slips it in just outside off stump, Hussey lunges forward and misses, he just had his back leg in time, beaten in the flight from Botha
Ntini to White, no run 135ks, back of a length and White defends it back
Ntini to White, no run a tad fuller and angling back in, White defends to the off side
Ntini to White, 2 runs pitches and angles back in, White pushes at it and gets an edge safely wide of slip and down to third man
Ntini to White, no run pitches back of a length and gets good bounce and White leaves
Ntini to White, no run inches forward and lunges at this one, dead-batting it back to Ntini
Ntini to White, no run angles back in and he pushes at it again, running to backward point
Botha to Hussey, no run short ball drifting down, Hussey plays a sweep but to the fielder
Botha to Hussey, 1 run pushed through fuller and quicker and Hussey drives to midwicket
Botha to White, no run spins down from middle and leg and he defends to the on side
Botha to White, 1 run that pitches fuller on about off stump and White defends to cover
Botha to Hussey, no run low full toss and he clips it to midwicket, failing to beat Gibbs
Botha to Hussey, 1 run tossed up outside off stump, slower, and he pushes it to the off side
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run pitches outside off stump and he steers the ball past point
Morkel to White, no run straighter ball, turned to Duminy at midwicket
Morkel to White, no run pitches it up full and he squeezes the drive to short cover
Morkel to White, no run pushes forward off the front foot and nudges the ball to short cover
Morkel to White, 1 run full toss on the stumps, he just turns it to square leg for one
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run overpitched on the toes and flicked out to deep square for one more
Botha to Hussey, no run drives a fullish delivery to the off side, cannot beat cover
Botha to Hussey, 1 run this one drifts down the pads and he turns it wide of midwicket
Botha to White, no run slower through the air, pitching on leg, White inside-edges to the on side
Botha to White, 1 run angled down and he paddles the ball to short fine leg
Botha to Hussey, no run full on middle and leg, Hussey flicks it straight to midwicket
Botha to Hussey, no run low full toss on the pads and he mistimes it to McKenzie at square leg
Morkel to White, no run short of a length outside off stump, steered toward point
Morkel to White, FOUR runs sweetly hit down the ground, off the middle of the bat, and it flies away over the infield, that was in the slot White just lofted through the line for four
Morkel to White, no run change of pace nearly does him, White rolls the wrists and chips the ball in the air in front of mid-on
Morkel to White, no run fuller outside off stump and he plays a conservative forward defensive
Morkel to White, 1 run a bit too straight and White turns it wide of square leg, all wrists
Morkel to Hussey, 1 run more positive strokeplay from Hussey, steering this past cover-point
Botha to Hussey, 1 run full on leg stump and flicked out to deep midwicket
Botha to White, no run slower delivery, off stumpish, White gets across to paddle it around the corner but cannot make good contact, the ball hits the toe of the bat and stops dead
Botha to White, no run tossed up generously and he defends solidly
Botha to White, no run pitches on middle and off and he plays it to midwicket
Botha to White, 1 run slips out a low full toss on the pads but White just bunts it to midwicket
Botha to Hussey, 1 run full again and another single, clipped through the on side
Morkel to Hussey, FOUR runs bounces him this time and he pulls from outside off stump, just into the ground wide of a diving midwicket
Morkel to Hussey, no run follows up with a full one, which he clips from off stump to midwicket
Morkel to Hussey, OUT slower ball does the trick! Albie pitches it up to draw a loose drive from Hussey straight into the lap of Gibbs at short cover, who makes no mistake when holding it
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run back of a length, just outside off, pushed towards cover, and the batsmen pinch a quick single, Hopes could have been run out if there was a direct hit
Morkel to White, no run nice, tight line on off, White defends off the back foot to the bowler
Morkel to White, no run hits a length and he keeps the last ball out
Botha to Hopes, no run pitches on the stumps and he turns it to midwicket
Botha to Hopes, no run again he drives down the ground but cannot beat mid-on
Botha to Hopes, 1 run uses his feet and just manages to beat the fielder this time
Botha to White, 1 run tossed up and he works the ball off his pads for a single
Botha to Hopes, no run lobbed up gently, he gets across and turns the ball away
Botha to Hopes, no run comes well forward and plays a very compact forward defensive
Duminy to White, no run tossed up gently and defended watchfully
Duminy to White, 1 run drifts a tad wider and he pokes it toward gully, sprinting hard
Duminy to Hopes, 3 runs tossed up and Hopes collects on the volley, punching past mid-off
Duminy to White, no run pushes at that one and gets an inside-edge back down the track
Duminy to White, no run flights it up and he gets over it to defend it back to Duminy
Duminy to White, no run flights it just outside off stump, making White come get it, and he pushes awkwardly to the off side, thats good bowling from Duminy
Botha to Hopes, 1 run a touch short and he makes room to punch that past cover
Botha to White, no run slower ball, thrown up there and it dips on White, who checks the shot
Botha to White, 2 runs again he lobs it up and now White manages to drive past cover
Botha to White, no run throws it up invitingly, White gets down to sweep but misses, ball hits his forearm, then pops up to his chin and finally settles down near his back boot, what a mess
Botha to White, 1 run drifts full on the pads and White clips it out to deep midwicket
Botha to Hopes, no run throws it up on the stumps and he pushes the ball to the fielder
Duminy to Hopes, no run tossed up outside off stump and he drives to the off side
Duminy to Hopes, 1 run tossed up again and he plays the ball to the off side
Duminy to White, 1 run gives it some air, White reaches out and thumps that down the ground
Duminy to Hopes, no run spins back in sharply to Hopes, who backs away and just gets bat on it
Duminy to Hopes, 1 run shuffles back again and clips a fuller delivery to midwicket
Duminy to White, SIX runs now he's seen enough and gets down to send that one rows back over deep midwicket, just getting down and hitting with the turn for an impressive shot
Morkel to Hopes, no run pitched up full outside off, slower ball, square-driven to the fielder
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run gets some room and opens the face, steering it behind point
Morkel to White, 1 run slower ball, hitting a length and he gently dabs it in front of cover, calling for the quick single and some excellent hustling gets them it as well
Morkel to Hopes, no run back of a length and he pushes it to the off side again
Morkel to Hopes, no run pitches on a length and he dabs the ball into the gaps
Morkel to Hopes, no run full and wide and he flings the bat at it, connecting only with air
Steyn to White, no run pitches full on the stumps and he presents a full face back
Steyn to White, no run nips back in off the seam and White jabs it down to backward point
Steyn to White, 1 run overpitches on White's pads and he clips it away for a single
Steyn to Hopes, 2 runs pulls a short ball from outside off out to Ntini running across in the deep
Steyn to Hopes, no run another swing and a miss, this time from Hopes, who backs away in an attempt to flay the ball over the off side
Steyn to Hopes, 1 run change of pace, 119ks, turned off the stumps to deep square leg
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run good shot, backing away and getting over a short one with a wristy punch
Morkel to White, 1 run gets up and steers a shortish one down to third man for one
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run makes room and drives the fullish ball out to deep cover
Morkel to White, 1 run slower ball just outside off stump and he maneuvers it to third man
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run a tad fuller and he punches it down past the stumps for a single
Morkel to White, 1 run comes forward and pushes the ball toward extra cover for a sixth single
Steyn to White, OUT Steyn strikes, inviting the big shot and White chases the wide one from the crease and edges a simple catch to de Villiers, sashaying to his right
Steyn to Johnson, no run bouncer first up, 148ks, and Johnson flinches as he gets low
Steyn to Johnson, no run good ball, nipping across the bat at 149ks, Johnson plays down the wrong line and misses
Steyn to Johnson, no run short of a length on off stump and defended straight to point
Steyn to Johnson, no run back of a length and he punches it off the back foot to cover
Steyn to Johnson, 1 leg bye full down the pads and he gets a tickle on it, down to deep fine leg
Ntini to Johnson, no run pitches and goes across with the Ntini angle, Johnson leave it be
Ntini to Johnson, OUT a nothing shot, just leaning in and hitting straight to Morne at mid-off
Ntini to Hilfenhaus, no run pitches on a length and defends solidly to the off side
Ntini to Hilfenhaus, no run comes back with the angle and he defends it back to Ntini
Ntini to Hilfenhaus, no run slower ball on the stumps and Hilfenhaus defends it back
Ntini to Hilfenhaus, no run angles a bit too straight and he uses the wrists to clip toward mid-on
Steyn to Hopes, 2 runs makes room and slices it between point and gully out to sweeper
Steyn to Hopes, 1 run slower ball, commits him forward and he edges safely to third man
Steyn to Hopes, 2 runs flashes the bat at a wider one and edges to third man again
Steyn to Hopes, no run beats the bat, hits a length and straighten, cutting him in half
Steyn to Hopes, no run pitches on a length and he loosely pushes to the off side, one-handed
Steyn to Hopes, no run frees the arms to slash it square but cannot connect again
Ntini to Hilfenhaus, no run pitches on the stumps, and he defends it back to the bowler
Ntini to Hilfenhaus, no run comes onto the front foot and drives the ball to the covers
Ntini to Hilfenhaus, 1 run gets to the pitch and steers the ball to the off side again
Ntini to Hopes, 1 run 140ks, slanting into leg stump and he drives it down the ground
Ntini to Hilfenhaus, no run pitched up and Hilfenhaus drives it into the covers
Ntini to Hilfenhaus, no run tidy end to a tidy over, Ntini angles it back in and the batsman defends
Steyn to Hopes, 1 run makes room and cuts that past point on the off side
Steyn to Hilfenhaus, 1 run 148.7ks, back of a length and Hilfenhaus pokes it to point
Steyn to Hopes, no run makes room again and chops the ball into the off side
Steyn to Hopes, SIX runs smacked! Hopes picks the slower ball, backs away to leg stump, and goes through with a lovely flick over midwicket for half a dozen
Steyn to Hopes, FOUR runs more fun from Hopes, moving back and slicing the full ball to deep point
Steyn to Hopes, 1 run jumps away towards the on side and steers the ball to third man
Ntini to Hopes, 1 run slips in a yorker to Hopes, who backs away and drives and gets an inside edge past leg stump down to deep fine leg
Ntini to Hilfenhaus, 1 run again into the blockhole and bunted down to mid-on
Ntini to Hopes, no run slower ball, wide of the stumps and steered to backward point
Ntini to Hopes, FOUR runs clean strike, creating room and biffing that over extra cover
Ntini to Hopes, 1 run pitches full on leg stump, again Hopes goes inside-out to mid-off
Ntini to Hilfenhaus, no run pitches from wide and beats the bat, that was all about the angle
Duminy to White, no run tossed up on the stumps and driven straight to midwicket
Duminy to White, no run drifts down the pads and he turns it around the corner to square leg
Duminy to White, 1 run lands on the stumps and he now glances it away for one
Duminy to Hopes, 1 run gets to the pitch and punches down the ground
Duminy to White, no run reaches out for it and closes the face, nearly giving cover a catch
Duminy to White, no run tossed up straighter and White clips, but cannot beat midwicket
Morkel to Hopes, 1 run pitches fullish and Hopes drives between cover and point for one
Morkel to White, 1 run a bit shorter in length and he steers that safely down to third man

Morkel to Hopes, 1 run short of a length outside off, Hopes hops back and pokes it to point, sets off and had Gibbs hit with that throw he would have been gone, great fielding though to get there in time to collect
Morkel to White, no run pitches fullish and White defends to the off side
Morkel to White, no run pitches on the stumps and he drops his head to defend
Morkel to White, no run pitches on middle and tails in, White defends it back
Steyn to Hopes, OUT backs away one time too many and slices the ball off the toe end of the bat to McKenzie, taking a step back at cover to pouch the offering just at the circle
Steyn to Tait, 1 run pitches on a length just outside off, Tait moves back and runs it fine
Steyn to Hilfenhaus, no run has a waft at a short ball and fails to make contact
Steyn to Hilfenhaus, no run slides down the pads and strikes him clearly outside the stumps
Steyn to Hilfenhaus, 2 runs angling into the pads again and he clips it down to deep square
Steyn to Hilfenhaus, no run ah, that was close, it pitched fullish and angled back in and he cut a cramped shot from just on top of off stump and into the cover and point region
Morkel to Tait, no run hit on the rise to cover, backing away again
Morkel to Tait, no run moves away and hits the ball to the off side, mid-off does the fielding
Morkel to Tait, no run 140ks, he goes back and steers it to Gibbs at backward point
Morkel to Tait, no run wafts at a short delivery off the back foot, missing completely
Morkel to Tait, 3 runs slips in the attempted yorker, Tait makes room and hits it over the bowler's head, not a bad shot at all and he and Hilfenhaus scamper three
Morkel to Hilfenhaus, OUT and its all over, as Hilfenhaus pokes at one outside off stump and gets a faint edge back to de Villiers, moving to his left

South Africa bowl Australia out for 222 in 48 overs. Real bad from Australia, who failed to see out their alloted overs. South Africa need 223 to win the series. It was a disciplined effort from them. We will be back in a while for
Welcome back for the chase. South Africa will fancy themselves tonight. Two slips in place. Tait will start proceedings. Plenty of good cheer across the Adelaide Oval. Amla is on strike.
Tait to Amla, 3 runs a touch shot from Amla, hopping up and nudging the ball off his pads into the gap at square leg, the fielder runs after it and returns a good flat throw to Haddin
Tait to Gibbs, 1 wide bad ball, sprayed a mile down the pads and Haddin has to hustle
Tait to Gibbs, 1 run 145ks, pitched up and Gibbs pushes it to extra cover for one
Tait to Amla, no run 150.5ks, hits a length and goes the other way, Amla pokes it to backward point
Tait to Amla, no run 150ks, banged in short and he drops his hands to leave it be
Tait to Amla, no run 148ks, back of a length and Amla defends it to cover
Tait to Amla, FOUR runs lovely shot, Tait pitches it up wider and Amla bisects the covers
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, no run pitched up outside the stumps and Gibbs pushes to cover
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, no run gets across and works a straighter delivery to midwicket
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, FOUR runs sumptuous, Hilfenhaus delivers the outswinger and Gibbs bunts it with a straight bat past mid-off and extra cover, all along the ground
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, FOUR runs after the caress comes the club, just hitting it in the air over extra cover for a one-bounce four, the Gibbs specialty on view
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, no run now he's carried away, pulling and missing a shorter one
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, no run pitched up on a length and he pushes the ball to extra cover
Tait to Amla, 1 wide errant delivery slides down the leg side and more work for Haddin
Tait to Amla, no run pitched up outside off with some gentle wobble and Amla leaves
Tait to Amla, 2 runs comes onto the front foot to drive to cover, who allows a couple
Tait to Amla, no run 152ks short on the body and he shuffles to turn it to square leg
Tait to Amla, no run pitches short of a length and he gets in line to block it back
Tait to Amla, 2 runs full and swinging back in and he clips it past midwicket

Tait to Amla, no run loud appeal for lbw, Tait slides it down and angles toward leg stump, Amla is beaten on the shot and hit on the front pad, they all ask the question but it was doing a bit too much and the umpire walks aw
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, FOUR runs good use of the feet, waltzing down and hitting over extra cover
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, no run short of a length and Gibbs defends it to the off side
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, FOUR runs skips down and clips this one in the air over midwicket
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, no run 120.6ks, outside leg stump and turned to square leg
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, no run plays a cramped attempt of a pull of sorts, that was not a short enough ball and he is hit on the thigh above the stumps
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, no run pitches straighter and he defends the ball to midwicket
Tait to Amla, no run pitches and comes in and he pushes the ball to cover
Tait to Amla, no run slides down the pads with the angle, Amla is late on the shot
Tait to Amla, no run short on the stumps and Amla hops, rolling the wrists on the shot
Tait to Amla, no run 149ks, rears up off the pitch and Amla does well to leave that
Tait to Amla, no run slips in the full delivery that nips back in and Amla pushes it back
Tait to Amla, 1 run on the pads and twirled down to deep square leg extravagantly
Hilfenhaus to Amla, no run pitched up by Hilfenhaus and pushed back solidly
Hilfenhaus to Amla, no run now its back of a length and Amla jabs it to cover
Hilfenhaus to Amla, no run gets onto the toes and punches the ball to the off side, Warner flings himself around at cover and intercepts excellently, then fires back a flat throw
Hilfenhaus to Amla, 1 run straighter one, Amla shuffles and turns it past midwicket
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, FOUR runs driven on the rise, superbly, off the front foot square on the off side
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, FOUR runs four more, this one thumped through extra cover with plenty of oomph
Johnson to Amla, 1 run begins with a full toss that Amla bunts straight to midwicket
Johnson to Gibbs, no run takes on a short ball, 145ks, but toe-ends it to midwicket
Johnson to Gibbs, no run 146ks, short and rising and he chases it, beaten completely
Johnson to Gibbs, FOUR runs vintage Gibbsy! steps out as if this were slow left-arm orthodox, and crashes it through the covers, more timing than power
Johnson to Gibbs, 1 run fullish, on the stumps, and played to right of cover, and a quick single is taken
Johnson to Amla, no run around off stump, and fullish, Amla defends it solidly
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, 2 leg byes short of a length, on the pads, looks to turn it to leg, but this one gets big on him, and goes to thirdman off the thigh pad
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, no run full on the pads, and he has missed out there, turns it straight to short fine
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, no run short, down the leg, looks to pull, but this doesn't rise enough, and he misses
Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, 1 run fuller, angling into the pads, and pushed to wide of mid-on for an easy single
Hilfenhaus to Amla, no run slower ball, 122ks, on the stumps, and Amla is watchful is defense
Hilfenhaus to Amla, no run just short of a length, on the off, Amla looks to push it through covers, but doesn't get enough room to place it properly

Johnson to Gibbs, FOUR runs by now he should know you don't ball full on the pads to Gibbs in this form. He just turns his wrists on it, makes sure it is hit in the air, and an easy boundary over square leg
Johnson to Gibbs, no run shorter, angled across him, and he plays it into the covers
Johnson to Gibbs, 1 run length ball, angling across Gibbs, and he plays it to left of mid-off for an easy single
Johnson to Amla, 1 run short of a length, and Amla turns it to right of mid-on, an easy single ensues
Johnson to Gibbs, 2 runs attempts a bouncer, Gibbs looks to pull, doesn't connect properly and just clears midwicket
Johnson to Gibbs, no run just short of a length, on the stumps, and for a change Gibbs defends
Hilfenhaus to Amla, 1 run short outside off, and helped away for a single into the off side

Hilfenhaus to Gibbs, OUT and Gibbs finally plays a false stroke, steps out, Hilfenhaus pulls the length back, Gibbs is short of the pitch and he still goes ahead with the shot, top-edging it to mid-off where Michael Hussey ta
Hilfenhaus to Kallis, no run short and wide, and Kallis lets it go, quite close to being called a wide

Hilfenhaus to Kallis, FOUR runs dropped, Kallis gets a short one that sits up, and he pulls it straight to Shaun Marsh at short square leg, but Marsh is late to react, and it deflects off him to midwicket boundary
Hilfenhaus to Kallis, no run defended off the back foot cover-point
Hilfenhaus to Kallis, no run full, on the stumps, and driven to mid-off
Johnson to Amla, 3 runs great shot, all wrists, Amla muscling it past Marsh at square leg
Johnson to Kallis, no run 144ks, back of a length and he punches it to point
Johnson to Kallis, FOUR runs dug in short and Kallis short-arm-jabs it wide of square leg
Johnson to Kallis, no run pitched up this time and he pushes it off the front foot to cover
Johnson to Kallis, no run pitches outside leg stump, he shuffles and works it to midwicket
Johnson to Kallis, FOUR runs pitched up on the stumps and he clips it supremely past midwicket
Tait to Amla, no run pitched up on off stump and bunted back, Tait deflects it away
Tait to Amla, no run pitches and slants into Amla, who shuffles and works it away
Tait to Amla, no run back of a length and he pushes it straight to cover
Tait to Amla, FOUR runs veers straighter and Amla whips it in the air between two fielders
Tait to Amla, 1 run low full toss swinging down leg stump, plays the glance and gets a fine inside edge on it to escort the ball down to fine leg, Tait appeals for something
Tait to Kallis, 1 run pushes it to midwicket, he gets across and stumbles, they nearly have a mix-up but the throw is off the mark
Hopes to Kallis, no run pitched up and Kallis punches off the front foot to cover
Hopes to Kallis, OUT neat catch at short midwicket! Kallis walks down and across and flicks the ball, but he fails to keep it down and Marsh cups his hands in front of his face to take the catch
Hopes to de Villiers, no run pushes at it off the front foot and inside-edges onto front pad
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run pitched up on off stump, AB drives and inside-edges to mid-on for one
Hopes to Amla, no run tidy delivery, served up full and this one is watchfully defended
Hopes to Amla, FOUR runs nothing but a push off the front foot, getting to the pitch, and Amla manages to beat a diving cover fielder, he is a touch artiste, this man Amla
Tait to de Villiers, FOUR runs overpitched outside off stump and he drives into the covers excellently
Tait to de Villiers, no run reaches out and drives but cannot pierce the gap this time
Tait to de Villiers, 1 run rather wide and he cuts the ball out to deep backward point
Tait to Amla, no run pitches right up there and Amla pushes it straight to cover
Tait to Amla, no run straighter delivery whipped across the line but he cant beat midwicket
Tait to Amla, FOUR runs Tait continues to pitch it up in search of swing but this one is a bit too wide and its clumped off the front foot this time, square on the off side
Hopes to de Villiers, no run pitches full and starts to seam in, he defends off the front foot
Hopes to de Villiers, 2 runs back of a length and he gets back and turns it past midwicket
Hopes to de Villiers, no run short of a length this time and pushed off the back foot to cover
Hopes to de Villiers, no run reaches out and slaps the half-volley but Mike Hussey dives well
Hopes to de Villiers, FOUR runs fantastic batting, this one pitches back of a length on off stump and AB plays a flat-batted, on-the-move swat in front of square leg for a boundary
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run pitches full and he eases a good-looking steer to deep mid-off
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 wide full and very, very wide, AB would've needed a pole to get that
Johnson to de Villiers, 2 runs ah, thick outside edge off a slash to a wide one again, lucky shot
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 run gets across to outside off and nudges the ball to midwicket, classy
Johnson to Amla, 1 run pitches outside leg stump and deflected to the on side again
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 run exposes leg stump as he walks across the sticks, Johnson pitches outside leg stump once more and AB flicks it down to deep square leg for a single
Johnson to Amla, no run gets some lift on this one and Amla miscues the attempted flick
Johnson to Amla, no run hits a good length outside off stump and Amla defends to cover
Hopes to de Villiers, no run slants in from off stump, steered with the wrists to midwicket
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run a tad straighter and now AB knocks it in front of square for a single
Hopes to Amla, no run pitched up full and he has a flirt at, risky shot and he's beaten
Hopes to Amla, no run hops back and knifes the ball with those wrists, but midwicket dives
Hopes to Amla, no run 122ks, again angling in to Amla, who turns it to midwicket
Hopes to Amla, no run punches this one to the off side and Hopes gets across to cut it off
Johnson to de Villiers, no run pitches on the dime and that one is turned straight to midwicket
Johnson to de Villiers, no run pitches outside off stump and he steers it to backward point
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 run slides into leg stump and he tucks it to the man at midwicket
Johnson to Amla, 1 run slips in a short one down the hips and he clips it away for one
Johnson to de Villiers, no run much fuller and coming back in and he defends staunchly
Johnson to de Villiers, no run pitched up again, a tad wider, and AB square-drives to the fielder
Hopes to Amla, 1 run down the pads, turned fine and Hilfenhaus runs in to field
Hopes to de Villiers, no run back of a length and he gets back to defend it, inside-edging to leg
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run gets onto the front foot and carves the ball into the covers
Hopes to Amla, 1 run bowls one short and Amla connects from outside off stump, making sure to roll the wrists and pulls into the ground in front of midwicket
Hopes to de Villiers, no run hits a fuller length and AB just pats it back with proper defence, then the ball bounces and sits up to catch him on the grill
Hopes to de Villiers, no run pitches full and AB drives the ball to the man at cover
Johnson to Amla, no run 144ks, on a length and defended off the toes to the on side
Johnson to Amla, 1 run comes forward and steers the ball to extra cover, Warner dives
Johnson to de Villiers, no run loose stroke to one pitching back of a length, AB chases and misses as the angle comes back in
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 run a more sensible tap to the off side, and Amla is quick to respond
Johnson to Amla, 1 run pitched up and he pushes the ball to the off side
Johnson to de Villiers, no run slants back in, AB defends, Amla sets off and gets shooed back
Hopes to Amla, 1 run offered some room, Amla maneuvers the ball out to deep third man
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 leg bye pitched up again and AB pinches an easy single, just pushed away
Hopes to Amla, no run forces that off the back foot, not much foot movement, too much bottom hand on the shot and the ball takes an inside edge and rolls toward midwicket
Hopes to Amla, no run reaches out to hammer a full delivery through the covers but cocks the wrists and ends up dragging the ball back toward midwicket again
Hopes to Amla, 1 run a more conservative approach, shuffling and turning it off his pads
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run comes onto the front foot and dabs the bat out, angling past gully for one
Hussey to de Villiers, 1 run uses his feet immediately and on-drives the ball down the ground

Hussey to de Villiers, no run pushes it through, AB clips across the line and nearly pops a catch back
Hussey to de Villiers, 1 run flatter on the stumps and he shuffles to clip the ball away
Hussey to Amla, 1 run tossed up on the stumps and he pushes it to midwicket
Hussey to de Villiers, 2 runs comes forward and clips the ball away for a couple
Hopes to Amla, no run pitched up and defended to the off side, then he sends AB back
Hopes to Amla, no run plays a loose flirt to one served up a tad wider and fails to connect
Hopes to Amla, 1 run pitches on off stump, Amla goes back and flicks it to deep midwicket
Hopes to de Villiers, no run gets over a fullish delivery and taps it to the off side, but Amla says no
Hopes to de Villiers, no run plays a swat to one outside off stump but cannot beat midwicket
Hopes to de Villiers, no run pitches outside off stump and he nudges the ball to backward point
Hussey to Amla, no run tossed up and he drives hard back to Hussey's left side
Hussey to Amla, no run rolls the wrists hard and clips it back toward Hussey
Hussey to Amla, no run tossed up and Amla drives it to extra cover
Hussey to Amla, 1 run uses his feet and punches this one down the ground for one
Hussey to de Villiers, no run tossed up and defended
Hussey to de Villiers, 1 run flights this one a bit more and AB clips it down to long-on for one
Hopes to de Villiers, 2 runs pitches back of a length and he rides the bounce, steering it past point, they run the first one hard and come back for the second, but Hilfenhaus' throw is astray
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run fuller in length and AB opens the face, dabbing to short third man
Hopes to Amla, 1 run now its Amla's turn to open the face and run the ball away for one
Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run pitches on middle and leg and clipped away to the on side with ease
Hopes to Amla, no run reaches out and drives but cannot find the gaps
Hopes to Amla, 2 runs pitched up and Amla bunts it in the air wide of Hopes and mid-off
Hussey to de Villiers, 1 run gently tossed up outside off stump and he plays it to the on side
Hussey to Amla, no run pitches short and he rocks back to cut and so, so narrowly misses
Hussey to Amla, no run shuffles across and works the ball to midwicket
Hussey to Amla, 3 runs tosses it up and he goes inside-out in the air over the top of mid-off
Hussey to de Villiers, 1 run gets across and pushes the ball wide of the fielder for one
Hussey to Amla, 1 run looped up outside off stump and Amla drives to point
Hilfenhaus to Amla, 2 runs pitches on the toes and he crisply flicks it out to deep square leg
Hilfenhaus to Amla, no run punches a short one off the back foot and fails to beat cover
Hilfenhaus to Amla, 1 run a tad too wide and he opens the face, steering it to third man
Hilfenhaus to de Villiers, 1 run short and wide and flayed out to deep backward point
Hilfenhaus to Amla, 1 run short of a length, he flashes a cut and miscues it to backward point
Hilfenhaus to de Villiers, 3 runs slides down the pads and he glances it to deep fine leg
Hussey to de Villiers, 1 run tossed up full and drifting into the stumps, AB closes the face too early and gets a leading edge to the off side for a single that brings up South Africa's 150
Hussey to Amla, 1 run reaches out and square-drives the wide delivery past point
Hussey to de Villiers, 2 runs pushes the ball away and runs very hard, thats excellent sprinting
Hussey to de Villiers, FOUR runs swings with the turn and clips it over mid-on for four, top shot
Hussey to de Villiers, SIX runs oh thats crunched by AB, rocking back and flat-batting the short ball over midwicket for maximum, and whats more that is his half-century as well, fine knock
Hussey to de Villiers, 1 run tossed up and he clips a single away to square leg
Hilfenhaus to de Villiers, no run pitches on the stumps and he forces the ball to midwicket
Hilfenhaus to de Villiers, 1 run comes forward and drives the ball to Ponting
Hilfenhaus to Amla, 1 run a bit wider and he plays the ball away to the fielder behind square
Hilfenhaus to de Villiers, 2 runs hops across and blushes the ball wide of midwicket and sprints
Hilfenhaus to de Villiers, FOUR runs Hilfenhaus tries a short-pitched delivery and that is pulled with ferocity and not a fielder moved, Marsh just didn't pick it with the sun in his eyes
Hilfenhaus to de Villiers, no run slips in a cutter and AB plays and misses at that one
Johnson to Amla, 1 run starts off full outside off, 144ks, Amla toe-ends it to point
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 run gets across to outside off, exposing middle and leg, and flicks it
Johnson to Amla, 1 run short of a length outside off stump, he forces it off the back foot
Johnson to de Villiers, no run full and wide, AB kneels down and slashes and makes an utter mess
Johnson to de Villiers, no run gets a full toss outside off and bunts it to Ponting at mid-off
Johnson to de Villiers, no run pitches on and angles across, AB comes onto the front foot, starts to defend and then adjusts to steer the ball into the ground in front of Michael Hussey at first slip
Tait to Amla, 1 run An attempted yorker just outside off, Amla squeezes it to third man
Tait to de Villiers, no run length ball on off, de Villiers drives confidently, but doesn't beat the man at cover
Tait to de Villiers, no run some movement into the batsman after pitching, de Villers gets a thick inside edge towards mid-on
Tait to de Villiers, FOUR runs Shot! superbly timed by de Villiers, stands tall and square drives Tait for four
Tait to de Villiers, 1 run not as pretty this time, ball moves a touch in and de Villiers gets an inside edge , this time to short fine leg
Tait to Amla, no run punched towards mid-off by Amla, too much power in the stroke to give the batsmen time to steal a single
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 run starts off wide a wide, full ball, the batsman leans in to a drive towards extra cover
Johnson to Amla, 1 run same length but the line is on middle this time, Amla drives inside-out to the covers, mistimed
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 run de Villiers shuffles across the stumps and taps an outside off ball towards mid-on
Johnson to Amla, 1 wide whoah, wild delivery from Johnson, full toss and very wide outside off
Johnson to Amla, 1 run overpitched, on middle and off, pushed towards mid-off for a single, tight single is taken
Johnson to de Villiers, FOUR runs another nonchalant walk across the stumps from de Villiers, this time to smash Johnson through midwicket
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 run wide outside off, de Villiers reaches for that and cuts it towards cover for a single
Tait to de Villiers, 1 run attempted swinging yorker, just clipped with an inside edge to the deep
Tait to Amla, 1 run pitches full in search of swing, Amla drives and inside-edges to leg
Tait to de Villiers, no run pitched up again and he flips it to midwicket again, loosely
Tait to de Villiers, 1 run overpitched on the toes, plenty of swing, and this is flipped away in style
Tait to Amla, no run digs it in a short one outside off stump and he drops the hands to leave
Tait to Amla, no run pitched up outside off stump and he pushes the ball to extra cover
Johnson to de Villiers, 2 runs pitches outside leg stump and he deflects it down to deep fine leg
Johnson to de Villiers, no run pitched up and he drives it handsomely to the off side
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 leg bye short down the pads and he swings it wide of square leg
Johnson to Amla, 1 run makes some room and punches the ball square through the off side
Johnson to de Villiers, no run pitches it up on off stump and AB drives straight to cover
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 run tries a short ball on about leg stump and AB swats it off one leg
Tait to de Villiers, 1 run short and wide and sliced away, Warner tumbles and intercepts
Tait to Amla, FOUR runs this time Amla makes no mistake, rising onto the toes and forcing the ball away off the back foot, off the middle of the blade, and picks the gap in front of point
Tait to Amla, no run overpitched, understandably, and Amla eases a drive to mid-off
Tait to Amla, no run banged in short, sits up off the deck, Amla goes for an uppercut and misses
Tait to Amla, no run fuller in length, hint of swing, punched on the rise toward cover
Tait to Amla, no run change of pace, just 121ks, almost a yorker length outside off stump, Amla jams the toe of the bat on it and mistimes it, then pushes it away as it rolls toward the stumps
Johnson to de Villiers, 1 run shuffles across, then back, then forward, and pushes it wide of cover
Johnson to Amla, FOUR runs not a half-volley but Amla punches on the rise past Ponting at mid-off
Johnson to Amla, no run pitches just back of a length and this time Amla plays it to Ponting
Johnson to Amla, no run banged in short, up he goes, steering it down in front of first slip

Johnson to Amla, FOUR runs short of a length and Amla gets back onto the toes, shoving the ball back in the air just wide of Tait's left hand, it bounces and runs down the ground, great placement there
Johnson to Amla, 1 run another crisp hit from Amla, standing tall and punching into the covers
Tait to Amla, 1 run pitches short and cramps him, he hops up and tucks off the ribs for one
Tait to de Villiers, 1 run very full on the stumps and AB manages to clip it away for one more
Tait to Amla, 1 run sends down a full toss and he mistimes the shot to midwicket
Tait to de Villiers, no run pitches down leg and straightens, AB adjusts and bunts to the on side
Tait to de Villiers, 1 run smashed off the front foot and Warner dives excellently at cover
Tait to Amla, 1 run a tad too straight and Amla crisply brushes it off his pads out to the deep
Hilfenhaus to Amla, 1 wide very full and wide and Haddin has to earn his match fee
Hilfenhaus to Amla, no run short of a length and he swats it off one leg and beats square leg
Hilfenhaus to Amla, 1 leg bye slides down the pads and he cant get bat on it, ball flies to point
Hilfenhaus to de Villiers, no run pitches on middle and leg and he on-drives it down the ground
Hilfenhaus to de Villiers, no run another hard-hit on-drive down toward the fielder
Hilfenhaus to de Villiers, 1 run swings across the line, cross-bat and all, and midwicket fumbles
Hilfenhaus to Amla, no run banged in short, Amla gets tall and fends it down back the track

Hopes to de Villiers, 1 run full down the pads, clipped away, Hilfenhaus dives at short fine leg and stops but Amla and de Villiers have crossed for the winning single and South Africa win the series!
Hope you've enjoyed the coverage. Thanks for your time. Be well!
Do come back and join us for the fifth and final game, which is on January 30 in Perth.
So thats it, South Africa have won the Tests and the ODIs. A great tour for them indeed. Congratulations.

After chasing down 270 in Sydney last week, 223 didn't prove that hard for South Africa, particularly with a number of the batsmen in form. Gibbs had a bit of fun what with the fielding restrictions and all, and after he fell Kalli

How about a quick recap? Ponting won the toss on a good batting deck and made first use. South Africa's bowlers performed admirably in the stifling heat and struck back around Ponting's fifty. The captain, Botha, was frugal with th

Well then, South Africa are enjoying the moment. They have taken an unassailable 3-1 lead with one game to go. AB and Amla whoop it up and grab stumps for souvenirs. Hats off to South Africa. The Adelaide Oval cheers them on.
South Africa won by 8 wickets (with 71 balls remaining)
Player of the match is AB de Villiers, SA
